page.title: 14SPORT AND RECREATION.
page.content: Survey in Gildersome,New Farnley and Lower Wortley areas: 47.5% of all the people who took part in the survey actively participated in sport whilst 52.5% did not participate at all.Of those who took part in sport 17.5% took part in weekly activity. 22.5% only occasionally and 2.5% monthly. The %age of people who supported a particular sport was 31.25 whilst 68.75% did not watch sport at all.Of the sports given soccer proved to be the most popular with 8.75% of the people giving their support.Next was R.L and cricket with 5% of spectator support;13.75% watched sport weekly. Many of the people interviwed were over 30.People thought there was a general lack of sporting facilities in the area.Sugestions were indoor bad minton & squash courts;outdoor tennis courts and a bowling green.
